review: I dont know how I lived WITHOUT my Chromecast! Everyone needs at least ONE in their home! We have two of them -bedroom and livingroom. You can "cast" to your big screen from a tablet, pc or phone! (Netflix and youtube have never been so much FUN!) Its as easy as plugging in a lamp! Alot of great product for less than $35! ...Go ahead and try it...you wont be sorry :)
author: Cook Book Collector

review: I bought several Chromecasts and they have all worked fine. I stream Netflix, Hulu+, and Youtube all the time with no problems. Every once in a while it will update itself to add features/services. For $35 it's a good deal but make sure it supports the streaming service you want to use before ordering.
